ProcessTemplates.Name: Zoho CRM to JSON - Products
ProcessTemplates.Description: This template process exports the products and their information from Zoho CRM into a local JSON file.
ProcessTemplates.ProcessVariablesJson: {"AccountsDomain":{"Value":"\"https://accounts.zoho.eu\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"The accounts URL for the domain your Zoho instance is in. For example https://accounts.zoho.eu"},"ApiDomain":{"Value":"\"https://www.zohoapis.eu\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"The URL for the domain your Zoho instance is in. For example https://www.zohoapis.eu"},"ZohoClientId":{"Value":"\"abcdefg1234567\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"The client ID for Zoho."},"ZohoClientSecret":{"Value":"\"abcdefg1234567\"","IsSecret":true,"Mode":"text","Description":"The client secret for Zoho."},"ZohoGrantToken":{"Value":"\"abcdefg1234567\"","IsSecret":true,"Mode":"text","Description":"The grant token to be used for acquiring the access and refresh tokens for Zoho."},"TargetPath":{"Value":"\"/path/filename.json\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"The path to the target file, including the filename. If the file doesn't exist, it will be created, and if it does, it will be overwritten."},"RefreshTokenKey":{"Value":"\"ZohoRefreshToken\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"The key with which the Zoho API refresh token should be saved into the cache."}}

Process.Name: Zoho CRM to JSON - Products
Process.Description: This template process exports the products and their information from Zoho CRM into a local JSON file.
